intro: ARASAAC is a website that offers resouces and materials to help people with communication problems.
activateMessage: You are almost ready to join the ARASAAC community. Click on the following button to activate your user account.
contactar: You can contact us at arasaac@aragon.es
introResetPassword: According to your request we have modified your password to access ARASAAC. Your new password is:
rememberChangePassword: This password has been generated randomly. Remember you can modify your password from your user profile.
publishedMaterial: Your material has been published in ARASAAC
cooperation: Thank you for collaborating with ARASAAC!
